translations.english: The feudal lords saw that Han was defeated and all fled.

translations.chinese: 塞王欣、翟王翳降楚，殷王卬死。
translations.english: King Sai Xin and King Di Yi surrendered to Chu. King Yin Ang died.

translations.chinese: 呂后兄周呂侯將兵居下邑，漢王往從之。
translations.english: Empress Lü's elder brother Zhou Lühou led troops stationed at Xiayi. King Han went to join him.
He gradually gathered soldiers and officers, encamping at Dang.

translations.chinese: 漢王西過梁地，至虞，謂謁者隨何曰：「公能說九江王布使舉兵畔楚，項王必留擊之。
translations.english: King Han passed west through Liang territory and reached Yu. He said to the usher Sui He: "You can persuade King Jiujiang Ying Bu to raise troops and rebel against Chu. Xiang Yu will certainly stay to attack him.
